title: Fix scenario modeling inputs not updating forecast projections (coverage + hiring capacity)

sections.text: Scenario modeling changes to pipeline coverage targets and hiring capacity are not consistently recalculating forecast projections, causing stale totals and misleading recommendations. Ensure updates to these inputs trigger a full recompute of the scenario model and refresh all dependent UI values (totals, deltas, and per-segment breakdowns). Add a lightweight regression test to verify recalculation occurs on each input change.
